text: Delicious....  Why this gets high stars is not necessarily for the regular sushi, as it tastes similar to many other places, but for their fantastic service and specialized sushi or creations.  Never had sushi so delicious.
Excellent pour les Sushi en spécialité. Un des meilleurs resto de Sushi dans la région de Montréal.

Really impressive. Their surprise chef specialty lunch special is a fab option.... there are a few to choose from going up to $20.00 per person. It comes with a choice of soup or salad.  The little won ton soup is overly salty, so watch out. The salad was a good size although the ginger dressing was just this side of too spicy for me.  -Haven't tried the miso soup yet.  The sushi is A-1. Real fusion sushi here.  They come decorated with edible flowers and custom sauces depending on the roll. 
The service on my first two visits were great, my young waiter yesterday had some polishing up to do, with some moments of confusion.  Probably new since he seemed lost as to when to collect the plates.  Important note; the sushi rolls do not contain loads of rice. I will return soon enough  :-)
Amazing Chinese takeout. Sushi is fresh - atmosphere is clean and upscale. We will eat here again for sure. Tkx.
Très bon restaurant! Beau décor, bon service et très bonne bouffe! Nous sommes allé 4 fois déjà, Même si nous habitons l'est de la ville.
Personnel sympathique, service un peu lent. Tres bonne nourriture, très beau et propre restaurant. Environ 40-50$ par personne.
Very inspired menu. Only negative is that service is a tad too laid back (slow)

Went tonight 
It was simply amazing 
Fish is super fresh 
Their special sushis are off the chain delicious 
Definitely will be back for more 
The restaurant is gorgeous inside, nice atmosphere and extremely clean

Bonne bouffe, mais service excessivement lent! On a dû rester 1h avant de commander et une autre heure avant d'avoir notre commande....
Nous étions une grande tablée (12) mais cela ne justifie pas le temps d'attente. À la fin, le serveur a pris la peine d'emballer tous les restes dans des doggy bags avant de venir voir les trois personnes qui avaient pris un menu pour leur proposer leur dessert et le thé alors que nous avions fini de manger en premiers (un plat se mange plus vite que des sushis). Résultat, on a mangé le dessert pendant qu'il apportait la machine pour payer. Bref, je ne le conseillerai pas.

In Ile Perrot, these guys stand out. 
I started going almost once a week since they opened and still go back. 

They have a mix of Japanese and Chinese menu items, but I'm all about the sushi.
 
The chef specials are special so I highly recommend experimenting, they do a very good job at mixing it up.  

my only complaint I have is with the wait times on take out. I have done takeout more than a few times and have been stuck waiting at the counter 20 minutes longer than expected on Friday or Saturday nights. 

the last time I waited they gave me a $5 rebate for my next order, so that was something new, and appreciated.

Food is excellent and service is good if you're only a couple or three four people on one bill. The trouble, and I've been there quite a few times, happens when you're a larger group of 6-7 people that want to divide the meal accordingly. You really must take the time to sit with the waiter and go over your orders before the bills are brought in because otherwise my friends: they'll mess it up.

Their tag line should be:"Great sushi, horrible math and logic skills."

In my opinion, the best tasting sushi in the greater Montreal area. Most of the sushi in Montreal is crap anyways so it's not really hard to beat. Zento is a bit on the pricey side but their dishes are served artfully and taste delicious.

Il est très sympa ce resto asiatique sur l'île Perrot. Ne vous laisser pas influencer négativement par la façade type centre d'achat, et prenez place à l'intérieur sans crainte. D'entré de jeux, l'endroit vous séduira par son décor moderne d'influence asiatique. 

Le menu est un mélange un peu surprenant de mets japonais, cantonais, vietnamien et italiens (oui, vous avez bien lu, italien !). Vous trouverez aussi des tables d'hôtel pour chaque type de cuisine offert. Personnellement, je viens surtout ici pour les sushis qui sont délicieux. Je recommande particulièrement l'assiette de sashimi pour 25 $ qui contient une belle diversité de poisson. Le service est rapide et courtois. Je vous suggère de prendre place dans la section des banquettes. C'est dans cette section que l'ambiance est à son meilleur. 

J'enlève une étoile car le menu est un peu déroutant. J'avoue ne pas être impressionné par ces restos qui offrent de tout pour plaire à tout le monde. J'ai pour mon dire qu'à trop vouloir plaire, on fini par raté la cible. Ce n'est pas le cas ici, mais des pâtes italiennes au menu d'un resto asiatique, ça me laisse une drôle d'impression.

Complete and utter garbage, both the service and the sushi. The pieces were falling apart, doused in sauce and lacking in flavor. They use too much fillers in the sushi, little fish or quality ingredients and lots of rice. The seaweed in which the rolls are wrapped are low quality - too hard and chewy as opposed to being tender and flavorful. 

We were 2 people, had 7 orders, which were brought to us at a rate of 2 orders every 20 minute. By the time we got our last order, we had lost our appetite. And, to add insult to injury, it's way overpriced for what you're getting. 

I've been eating sushi 2 to 3 times a week for over 20 years, and this was by far the worst sushi experience I've ever had. Tasteless overpriced sushi delivered slowly and intermittently. Never going back there again!

- Made reservations. Japanese guy answered phone. Didn't ask for name/number (meaning no reservation)
- The place was nearly empty (reservation not needed)
- Kitchen was resistant in accommodating my dietary restriction
- Waiter kept coming back and asking why I couldn't eat certain items
- Sushi was presented quite fancy but, in terms of actual quality, it merits a 3/5
- Overall, I felt uncomfortable, unwelcomed and unsatisfied.

Every time I visit my parents in this area of town, I always make sure to go to dinner at this amazing sushi restaurant. The soups are delicious and the sushi are exquisite. I ordered the 15 piece sashimi and it was like an edible work of art.
